title: Local Guide Tour Management
name: Full Stack Tour Management Platform
description: A comprehensive tour management platform built with Next.js and Prisma, featuring real-time booking, guide management, and payment processing. Includes admin dashboard, user authentication, and responsive design.
challenges: Implementing real-time booking conflicts resolution and payment gateway integration
solutions: Used WebSocket for real-time updates and Stripe for secure payment processing

title: Medicine Vendor Platform
name: Pharmaceutical Inventory Management System
description: A comprehensive platform for managing pharmaceutical inventories, showcasing advertised products, and generating sales reports. Features dynamic querying, product management, and sales analytics.
challenges: Complex inventory tracking and real-time stock updates
solutions: Implemented MongoDB change streams for real-time inventory updates

title: E-Commerce Dashboard
name: Modern Admin Dashboard
description: A sleek and responsive admin dashboard for e-commerce management with real-time analytics, order tracking, and inventory management.
challenges: Creating responsive charts and handling large datasets
solutions: Implemented virtual scrolling and data pagination for performance

title: Task Management App
name: Collaborative Project Management
description: A collaborative task management application with team features, real-time updates, and project tracking capabilities.
solutions: Used Socket.io for real-time updates and implemented operational transformation

title: Weather Dashboard
name: Interactive Weather Application
description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics.
challenges: Handling multiple API calls and data visualization
solutions: Implemented caching strategy and optimized API calls

title: Portfolio Website
name: Personal Portfolio with CMS
description: A modern portfolio website with content management system, blog functionality, and contact form integration.
challenges: SEO optimization and content management integration
solutions: Used Next.js SSG and Sanity CMS for optimal performance and content management
